hero.title: Jino
hero.subtitle: Visual programming tool for Arduino. Build, connect, and upload your code effortlessly.

features.visualProgrammingDesc: Build your logic with intuitive drag-and-drop blocks.
features.codeGenerationDesc: Export clean Arduino code with one click.
features.seamlessUploadDesc: Upload directly to your Arduino board right from the browser. (Feature in development)

about.title: About Jino
about.paragraph1: Jino is a visual programming environment tailored for Arduino boards. Use drag-and-drop blocks to assemble logic, configure components with ease, and deploy your sketch with a single click.
about.paragraph2: Designed for both beginners and experienced developers, Jino streamlines your workflow, letting you focus on creativity instead of boilerplate code.
